Reviews.Title: “small rooms in good location to MRT Chinatown Station”

Reviews.Content: santa grand hotel lai yuen march 2012 middle chinatown souvenir stuff close street night outside hotel mrt chinatown station 50 metres day local bakeries restaurants provide meals drinks stayed twice hotel 12 hour flight stopovers dark doesnt windows bathrooms awkward shower lighting allow read clean efficient

Reviews.Title: “On the food street of China town.”

Reviews.Content: bed shower excellent pillows free wi fi air conditioners output directed onto bed extremely quoted nights charged 300 bed walled tree look else available price visit

Reviews.Title: “prepare for the worst, and you'll be fine”
Reviews.Author: palisade1978
Reviews.Content: prepare windowless dimly lit cubicle able sleep bath surf free internet watch tv location wise excellent artificial chinatown la singapore market strip building converted chinese opera expect dark atrium lobby oriental theme red blood color complete chinese lanterns people design unique otherwise scary kids nicest free internet sometimes connection slow youre value hotel worth penny considering convenient location

Reviews.Title: “The location says everything”
Reviews.Author: glendaloughbnb
Reviews.Content: location middle chinatown busy street noise lots people late restaurants traditional food courts couple minutes walk chinatown mrt station hotel fresh clean friendly compact comfortable quiet ac flat screen tv safe excellent wifi included glass french doors shutters towards street nice evening fresh air floors polished wood carpet chinese decoration tasteful red black throughout entrance lobby red atrium ceiling natural timber 3 stories skylights natural light stunning stay

Reviews.Title: “Nicely appointed tiny rooms in the heart of Chinatown”
Reviews.Author: eobri
Reviews.Content: found hotel excellent value expensive city stayed single window yes basically bed tiny desk bag chair ample space pack light bathroom modern shower water floor flat screen tv bed chamber lots english stations ac spent week thailand compared freezer bed hard typical asia free wifi found staff helpful checkin bellman explained amenities free tea hall location couldnt 5 minute walk chinatown mrt station

Reviews.Title: “Cool, small-roomed place in Chinatown”
Reviews.Author: Harkish
Reviews.Content: santa grand hotel lai yuen types reviews cool little hotel middle chinatown fantastic prices overpriced singapore hotel’s shoeboxes barely bigger walkin closet home descriptions correct hotel located pagoda street center chinatown short distance subway station financial district etc red predominant color – practically color former chinese opera house basically bed space stand bed upgraded double single hate imagine size single – space don’t stay read reviews forewarned ok wellappointed modern surprisingly roomy bathroom size bed comfortable ac blasting duvet pillows wonderful clean wifi – am writing downloading movie bbc tv mention paid 65 dollars including taxes clean cool central price hard beat

Reviews.Title: “good location but a shoe box with no windows for a room!”

Reviews.Content: website attracted attention hotel reflect staff uninterested lazy narrow red corridor dodgy escalator narrow red corridor size pod bags properly shower toilet flooded bathroom windows bed superior double £90 night hostel hotel prices look elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “Best Location but decoration is like old chinese traditional...”

Reviews.Content: xmas 2011 hotel locationnear walking 5 minute near cleanthe staff friendly servicebut lobby decoration red style chinese dont decoration feel stay ghost housethe cleani walk hotel chinatown simple cap superior double bed roomit twin beda cloth box
